perm_a: I declare that photos, films, or other digital materials related to children and employees attending kindergarten can be published on the internet.
perm_b: Permission to swim in the pool. There will always be an approved lifeguard present
perm_c: Permission to take pictures and videos of the child.
perm_d: Permission for an authorized photographer to take pictures and videos of the child
perm_e: Permission for images to be used in printed matter
perm_f: Permission for a newspaper to publish pictures of the child
perm_g: Permission for images to be used in presentations, e.g. slide show at parent meetings
perm_h: Permission to ride in a car with employees with approved security
perm_i: Permission to give the child iodine. In the event of an incident that causes large doses of radiation that is harmful to health (nuclear accident), it is important that children and young people are given iodine as soon as possible. This has been shown to reduce the risk of developing thyroid cancer
perm_j: The kindergarten has the opportunity to buy diapers for the children. Price is per month and will be added to the contingent bill
perm_k: Perimission to show parents personal information(name, surname, photo) on the app
perm_l: I declare that i will not share photos and information of any others
